text: A heptadecagon or septadecagon or 17-gon is a shape with 17 sides and 17 corners. == Regular heptadecagon == All sides of a regular heptadecagon are the same length. Each corner is 158.82°. All corners added together equal 2700°. === Area === The amount of space a regular heptadecagon takes up is The area of a regular heptadecagon of side length a is given by :A = \frac{17}{4}a^2\cot\frac{\pi}{17}\simeq 22,735a^2 === Heptadecagon construction === The regular heptadecagon edit geometry compass and ruler in 1796, demonstrated Carl Friedrich Gauss. This is due to Göttingen of a memorial statue of a regular heptadecagon pedestal. The following animation of a heptadecagon editing. : ==Related pages== * Carl Friedrich Gauss 17
title: Heptadecagon
